list.title: AnchorsAndHandles
list.description: Creates a new AnchorsAndHandles object.

list.title: AnchorsAndHandles#end_anchors
list.description: Returns the end anchors of the path.

list.title: AnchorsAndHandles#first_controls
list.description: Returns the first control points of the path.

list.title: AnchorsAndHandles#len
list.description: Returns the number of cubic bezier curves in the path.

list.title: AnchorsAndHandles#second_controls
list.description: Returns the second control points of the path.

list.title: AnchorsAndHandles#start_anchors
list.description: Returns the start anchors of the path.

list.title: AnchorsAndHandles.from_path
list.description: Creates a AnchorsAndHandles object from a Path2D object.

list.title: Arc
list.description: Creates a new Arc object from a center point, radius, start angle, and end angle.

list.title: Arc#both_tips_vector_object_builder
list.description: Returns a VectorObjectBuilder representing the arc and tips at both ends of the arc.

list.title: Arc#center
list.description: Returns the center point of the arc.

list.title: Arc#end_angle
list.description: Returns the end angle of the arc in radians.

list.title: Arc#end_tip_vector_object_builder
list.description: Returns a VectorObjectBuilder representing the arc and a tip at the end of the arc.

list.title: Arc#length
list.description: Returns the length of the arc.

list.title: Arc#point_at
list.description: Returns the point on the arc at a given t progress value.

list.title: Arc#radius
list.description: Returns the radius of the arc.

list.title: Arc#start_angle
list.description: Returns the start angle of the arc in radians.

list.title: Arc#start_tip_vector_object_builder
list.description: Returns a VectorObjectBuilder representing the arc and a tip at the start of the arc.

list.title: Arc#vector_object_builder
list.description: Creates a new vector object builder with the arc's points.

list.title: BoundingBox
list.description: Creates a new bounding box from a minimum x-coordinate, minimum y-coordinate, width, and height.

list.title: BoundingBox#center
list.description: Returns the center point of the bounding box.

list.title: BoundingBox#contains
list.description: Checks if a point is contained within the bounding box.

list.title: BoundingBox#height
list.description: Gets the height of the bounding box.

list.title: BoundingBox#intersects
list.description: Checks if the bounding box overlaps with another bounding box.

list.title: BoundingBox#min_x
list.description: Gets the minimum x-coordinate of the bounding box.

list.title: BoundingBox#min_y
list.description: Gets the minimum y-coordinate of the bounding box.

list.title: BoundingBox#width
list.description: Gets the width of the bounding box.

list.title: BoundingBox.from_path
list.description: Creates the instance of a path's bounding box.

list.title: BoundingBox.intersection
list.description: Returns the intersection of the bounding box with another bounding box, it means the area that is common to both bounding boxes.

list.title: BoundingBox.union
list.description: Returns the union of the bounding box with another bounding box, it means the smallest bounding box that contains both bounding boxes.

list.title: Circle
list.description: Creates a new Circle from a center Point2D and a radius.

list.title: Circle#arc
list.description: Creates an Arc from the circle.

list.title: Circle#area
list.description: Returns the area of the circle.

list.title: Circle#center
list.description: Returns the center point of the circle as a Point2D.

list.title: Circle#circumference
list.description: Returns the circumference of the circle.

list.title: Circle#radius
list.description: Returns the radius of the circle.

list.title: Circle#vector_object_builder
list.description: Creates a new VectorObjectBuilder from the circle.

list.title: Color
list.description: Creates a new Color with the given red, green, blue, and alpha components.

list.description: The alpha component of the color.

list.description: The alpha component of the color.

list.title: Color#blue

list.title: Color#blue
list.description: The blue component of the color.

list.title: Color#green
list.description: The green component of the color.

list.description: The green component of the color.

list.title: Color#red
list.description: The red component of the color.

list.title: Color#red
list.description: The red component of the color.

list.title: Color.default_color
list.description: Returns the default color, which is a fully transparent black.

list.title: Color.lerp
list.description: Linearly interpolates between two Colors given a progress value.

list.title: ColorStop

list.description: The color of the stop.

list.title: ColorStop#position
list.description: The position of the stop.

list.description: The position of the stop.

list.title: CubicBezierTuple
list.description: Creates a new cubic bezier curve.

list.title: CubicBezierTuple#end_anchor
list.description: Returns the end anchor of the cubic bezier.

list.title: CubicBezierTuple#first_control
list.description: Returns the first control point of the cubic bezier.

list.title: CubicBezierTuple#length
list.description: Returns an approximation of the length of the cubic bezier curve, based on sampling points along the curve and an optional extra length to add.

list.title: CubicBezierTuple#point_at
list.description: Returns the point on the cubic bezier curve at a given t value.

list.title: CubicBezierTuple#second_control
list.description: Returns the second control point of the cubic bezier.

list.title: CubicBezierTuple#start_anchor
list.description: Returns the start anchor of the cubic bezier.

list.title: CubicBezierTuple.from_line
list.description: Creates a new cubic bezier curve from a line.

list.title: CubicBezierTuple.from_quadratic
list.description: Creates a new cubic bezier curve from a quadratic bezier.

list.title: EquilateralTriangle
list.description: Creates a new EquilateralTriangle from a center point and side length.

list.title: EquilateralTriangle#area
list.description: Returns the area of the equilateral triangle.

list.title: EquilateralTriangle#center
list.description: Returns the center Point2D of the equilateral triangle.

list.title: EquilateralTriangle#height
list.description: Returns the height of the equilateral triangle.

list.title: EquilateralTriangle#perimeter
list.description: Returns the perimeter of the equilateral triangle.

list.title: EquilateralTriangle#side_length
list.description: Returns the side length of the equilateral triangle.

list.title: EquilateralTriangle#triangle
list.description: Creates a Triangle from the equilateral triangle.

list.title: EquilateralTriangle#vector_object_builder
list.description: Creates a VectorObjectBuilder from the equilateral triangle.

list.title: FontFace
list.description: Creates a new FontFace from font data.

list.title: FontFace#data
list.description: Returns the data of the font face.

list.title: ImageBitmap

list.title: ImageBitmap#data
list.description: Gets the pixel data of the bitmap.

list.title: ImageBitmap#data
list.description: Sets the pixel data of the bitmap.

list.title: ImageBitmap#get_pixel
list.description: Gets the color of a Point2D in the bitmap.

list.title: ImageBitmap#height
list.description: The height of the bitmap.

list.title: ImageBitmap#height
list.description: The height of the bitmap.

list.title: ImageBitmap#set_pixel
list.description: Sets a pixel color at a Point2D in the bitmap.

list.title: ImageBitmap#width
list.description: The width of the bitmap.

list.title: ImageBitmap#width
list.description: The width of the bitmap.

list.title: ImageBitmap#x
list.description: The x coordinate of the bitmap.

list.title: ImageBitmap#x
list.description: The x coordinate of the bitmap.

list.title: ImageBitmap#y
list.description: The y coordinate of the bitmap.

list.title: ImageBitmap#y
list.description: The y coordinate of the bitmap.

list.title: ImageBitmap.default_image_bitmap
list.description: Returns the default ImageBitmap, which is an empty bitmap.

list.title: ImageBitmap.fill
list.description: Gets a bitmap that is filled with a color.

list.title: ImageBitmap.fill_linear_gradient
list.description: Gets a bitmap that is filled with a linear gradient.

list.title: ImageBitmap.fill_radial_gradient
list.description: Gets a bitmap that is filled with a radial gradient.

list.title: ImageBitmap.lerp
list.description: Linearly interpolates between two ImageBitmaps given a progress value.

list.title: IntegerLerp
list.description: Interpolates between two values and returns the integer index and remainder.

list.title: IntegerLerp#index
list.description: Gets the integer index.

list.title: IntegerLerp#remainder
list.description: Gets the remainder.

list.title: Line
list.description: Creates a new Line object from two points.

list.title: Line#contains
list.description: Returns whether the line contains a given Point2D.

list.title: Line#distance_to_point
list.description: Returns the distance from the line to a given Point2D.

list.title: Line#end
list.description: The ending point of the line as Point2D.

list.title: Line#end
list.description: The ending point of the line as Point2D.

list.title: Line#intersection
list.description: Returns the intersection Point2D of the line with another line, if it exists.

list.title: Line#length
list.description: Returns the length of the line.

list.title: Line#midpoint
list.description: Returns the midpoint of the line as a Point2D.

list.title: Line#normal_slope
list.description: Returns the normal slope of the line.

list.title: Line#perpendicular_line
list.description: Returns the perpendicular line of the line at a given Point2D.

list.title: Line#slope
list.description: Returns the slope of the line.

list.title: Line#start
list.description: The starting point of the line as Point2D.

list.title: Line#start
list.description: The starting point of the line as Point2D.

list.title: Line#vector_object_builder
list.description: Gets a VectorObjectBuilder with the line's points.

list.title: Line#with_tip_at_the_end
list.description: Creates a VectorObjectBuilder with the line's points and a tip at the end.

list.title: Line#with_tip_at_the_start
list.description: Creates a VectorObjectBuilder with the line's points and a tip at the start.

list.title: Line#with_tips_at_both_ends
list.description: Creates a VectorObjectBuilder with the line's points and tips at both ends.

list.title: Line#y_intercept
list.description: Returns the y-intercept of the line.

list.title: LinearGradient
list.description: Creates a new LinearGradient with the given start point, end point, and ColorStops.

list.title: LinearGradient#color_at
list.description: Gets the Color at a given point along the gradient.

list.title: LinearGradient#color_at_offset
list.description: Gets the Color at a given offset along the gradient.

list.title: LinearGradient#color_stops
list.description: Gets the ColorStops of the gradient.

list.title: LinearGradient#color_stops
list.description: Sets the ColorStops of the gradient.

list.title: LinearGradient#p1
list.description: The start point of the gradient.

list.title: LinearGradient#p1
list.description: The start point of the gradient.

list.title: LinearGradient#p2
list.description: The end point of the gradient.

list.title: LinearGradient#p2
list.description: The end point of the gradient.

list.title: LinearGradient.default_linear_gradient
list.description: Returns the default LinearGradient, which is a gradient from the origin to the origin with no ColorStops.

list.title: LinearGradient.lerp
list.description: Linearly interpolates between two LinearGradients given a progress value.

list.title: LinearGradient.single_color_gradient
list.description: Returns the default LinearGradient, which is a gradient from the start to the end the same color.

list.title: Path2D
list.description: Creates a new Path2D with the given points.

list.title: Path2D#clear
list.description: Removes all Point2Ds from the Path2D.

list.title: Path2D#closest_point
list.description: Returns the closest Point2D in the Path2D to a given Point2D.

list.title: Path2D#cubic_bezier_tuples
list.description: Returns a CubicBezierTuple at a given index.

list.title: Path2D#get
list.description: Returns the Point2D at a given index.

list.title: Path2D#insert
list.description: Inserts a Point2D at a given index.

list.title: Path2D#is_empty
list.description: Returns whether the Path2D is empty.

list.title: Path2D#len
list.description: Returns the length of the Path2D.

list.title: Path2D#length
list.description: Returns an approximation of the length of the path, based on sampling points along each cubic bezier curve in the path and an optional extra length to add to each approximation.

list.title: Path2D#partial_bezier_path
list.description: Returns a new Path2D representing a bezier curve portion of the Path2D.

list.title: Path2D#points
list.description: Returns the Point2Ds of the Path2D.

list.title: Path2D#points
list.description: Sets the Point2Ds of the Path2D.

list.title: Path2D#pop
list.description: Removes the last Point2D from the Path2D.

list.title: Path2D#push
list.description: Appends a Point2D to the Path2D.

list.title: Path2D#push_bezier
list.description: Appends a CubicBezierTuple to the Path2D.

list.title: Path2D#remove
list.description: Removes a Point2D at a given index.

list.title: Path2D#repeat
list.description: Repeats the Path2D a given number of times.

list.title: Path2D#reverse
list.description: Reverse the Path2D.

list.title: Path2D#set
list.description: Sets the Point2D at the given index.

list.title: Path2D#set_slice
list.description: Sets a slice of the Path2D.

list.title: Path2D#slice
list.description: Returns a slice of the Path2D

list.title: Path2D.fill
list.description: Creates a new Path2D by filling the Path2D with a given Point2D a given number of times.

list.title: Path2D.from_anchors_and_handles
list.description: Creates a new Path2D given a AnchorsAndHandles object.

list.title: Point2D
list.description: Creates a new Point2D with the given coordinates.

list.description: Returns the angle between two Point2Ds.

list.description: Returns the distance between two Point2Ds.

list.title: Point2D#distance_squared
list.description: Returns the distance between two Point2Ds.

list.title: Point2D#dot
list.description: Returns the dot product of Point2D objects.

list.title: Point2D#equals
list.description: Checks if two Point2D objects are equal within a given tolerance.

list.title: Point2D#magnitude
list.description: Returns the magnitude of the Point2D.

list.title: Point2D#magnitude_squared
list.description: Returns the squared magnitude of the Point2D.

list.title: Point2D#normalized
list.description: Returns the normalized Point2D.

list.title: Point2D#rotate_around
list.description: Returns the Point2D rotated around a given center point by a given angle.

list.title: Point2D#x
list.description: The x-coordinate of the point.

list.title: Point2D#x
list.description: The x-coordinate of the point.

list.title: Point2D#y
list.description: The y-coordinate of the point.

list.title: Point2D#y
list.description: The y-coordinate of the point.

list.title: Point2D.lerp
list.description: Linearly interpolates between two Point2D objects.

list.title: RadialGradient#color_at

list.description: Gets the Color at a given offset along the gradient.

list.description: Sets the ColorStops of the gradient.

list.description: The focal point of the gradient.

list.title: RadialGradient.single_color_gradient

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#become_partial
list.description: Trims the stroke of the VectorObjectBuilder to the given start and end proportions.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#bezier_curve_to
list.description: Draws a cubic bezier curve from the current drawing point with the given control Point2Ds and end Point2D.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#build
list.description: Builds the VectorObject by applying sequentially all the operations to the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#clone
list.description: Clones the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#close
list.description: Closes the current subpath of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#fade_fill
list.description: Fades fill's opacity of the VectorObjectBuilder by the given factor.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#fade_stroke
list.description: Fades stroke's opacity of the VectorObjectBuilder by the given factor.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#insert_child
list.description: Inserts a child into the VectorObjectBuilder at the given index.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#insert_children
list.description: Inserts children into the VectorObjectBuilder at the given index.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#lerp_fill
list.description: Linearly interpolates the fill Style of the VectorObjectBuilder with another VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#lerp_stroke
list.description: Linearly interpolates the stroke Style of the VectorObjectBuilder with another VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#line_to
list.description: Draws a line from the current drawing point to the given Point2D.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#match_style_properties
list.description: Matches the style properties of the VectorObjectBuilder with another VectorObject.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#move_point
list.description: Moves the current drawing point to the given Point2D.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#move_to
list.description: Centers the VectorObjectBuilder at the given Point2D.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#next_to_other
list.description: Puts the VectorObjectBuilder next to the given VectorObjectBuilder at the given direction, with a buff distance between them and aligning at the given edge.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#next_to_point
list.description: Puts the VectorObjectBuilder next to the given Point2D at the given direction, with a buff distance between them and aligning at the given edge.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#pointwise_become_partial
list.description: Trims the path of the VectorObjectBuilder to the given start and end proportions.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#quadratic_curve_to
list.description: Draws a quadratic bezier curve from the current drawing point with the given control Point2D and end Point2D.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#remove_child_by_index
list.description: Removes a child from the VectorObjectBuilder given its index.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#remove_child_by_name
list.description: Removes a child from the VectorObjectBuilder given its name.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#remove_children_at_indices
list.description: Removes all children with the given indices from the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#remove_children_by_names
list.description: Removes all children with the given names from the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#reverse_path
list.description: Reverses the path of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#rotate
list.description: Rotates the VectorObjectBuilder by the given angle in radians.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#scale
list.description: Scales the VectorObjectBuilder by the given factor.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#scale_to_height
list.description: Scales the VectorObjectBuilder to the given height.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#scale_to_width
list.description: Scales the VectorObjectBuilder to the given width.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_actual_path
list.description: Sets the actual path of the VectorObjectBuilder. Actual path is the path that is drawn with its transformation matrix applied.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_children
list.description: Sets the children of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_fill
list.description: Sets the fill Style of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_fill_rule
list.description: Sets the fill rule of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_name
list.description: Sets the name of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_path
list.description: Sets the Path2D of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_slice_children
list.description: Sets the children from the start index to the end index of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_stroke
list.description: Sets the stroke Style of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_stroke_dash_array
list.description: Sets the stroke dash array of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_stroke_dash_offset
list.description: Sets the stroke dash offset of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_stroke_line_cap
list.description: Sets the stroke line cap of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_stroke_line_join
list.description: Sets the stroke line join of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_stroke_miter_limit
list.description: Sets the stroke miter limit of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_stroke_width
list.description: Sets the stroke width of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#set_transform
list.description: Sets the TransformationMatrix of the VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder#shift
list.description: Shifts the VectorObjectBuilder by the given dx and dy.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder.default_tip_shape
list.description: Returns the default tip shape pointing to the right and centered at the origin as a VectorObjectBuilder.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder.default_vector_object_builder
list.description: Creates a VectorObjectBuilder representing an empty VectorObject.

list.title: VectorObjectBuilder.from_svg
list.description: Creates a new VectorObjectBuilder from an SVG string.

list.title: inverse_lerp
list.description: Returns the progress value between two numbers given an interpolated value.

list.title: lerp
list.description: Linearly interpolates between two values given a progress value.

list.title: matrix_product
list.description: Multiplies two matrices together.

list.title: matrix_product_path
list.description: Multiplies a matrix by a path of 2D points, returning a new path.

list.title: module.exports
list.description: Creates a new CanvasScene.

list.title: module.exports
list.description: Creates a new Scene.

list.title: module.exports
list.description: Creates a new SVGScene.

list.title: play
list.description: Plays an animation.

list.title: render
list.description: Renders the scene to the canvas. Preferably don't await to keep the animation smooth.

list.title: render
list.description: Renders the scene to the SVG. Preferably don't await to keep the animation smooth.
